original_title: Bhima Swarga: The Journey of the Soul from Hell to Heaven
overview: Loosely based on a section of the great Indian Mahabharata epic, Mori's Bhima Swarga (The Heaven of Bhima) is a riveting audiovisual exercise that uses mural paintings from the 18th century Kertha Gosha court in Bali to create a beautiful jigsaw of colour, glitch, figurative exoticism and plastic abstraction
tagline: A spectacular audiovisual presentation for all ages.
title: Bhima Swarga: The Journey of the Soul from Hell to Heaven
